description: TOP switch in a cascadable switch topology for up to 30 hosts with x16 host links. All links in the TOP switch are x16 fabric ports to be connected to the Sub-switches. Connect Sub-switch 1 to ports 1-4, Sub-switch 2 to ports 5-8 and so on. Alternatively a host may be connected to one or more of the fabric ports (x16).
name: NTB cascade 30 ports x16 Top-switch
